effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.

effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.
